response.overview: New York is home to the world's most publicized and controversial gentlemen's club, Scores. The beautiful women who perform there are featured in this new adult special The Girls of Scores. Both men and women will find this film extremely erotic and sensual. In it, a selection of dancers profile themselves and answer various personal questions. The shocking scenes were shot entirely in New York and in Scores. You heard about it on the radio, noe see what all the talk is about!
response.tagline: Never before has a woman done New York.
response.title: Playboy: The Girls of Scores
